thread.title: Disney reorganizes businesses, creates direct-to-consumer unit

title: Disney reorganizes businesses, creates direct-to-consumer unit
text: March 14, 2018 / 4:23 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago Disney reorganizes businesses, creates direct-to-consumer unit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LOS ANGELES, March 14 (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co announced a reorganization on Wednesday that will create a new direct-to-consumer and international unit to reflect the company’s priorities as it adapts to a rapid shift toward online and mobile viewing. Kevin Mayer, the company’s chief strategy officer, was named chairman of the new division, which will oversee the launch of a family-oriented streaming service in late 2019, Disney said in a statement. (Reporting by Lisa Richwine Editing by Bernadette Baum)
